title: Ticket #1957: Node job failure/retries/slow aborted event/recovery mode cause error
description:
The following combination of events results in a fatal error in DAGMan:

1) A node job failed (killed by a signal). 2) DAGMan saw the terminated event for the job, and re-submitted it, because retries were turned on for that node. 3) After the re-submission, an ABORTED event for the first job was written to the user log. 4) DAGMan went into recovery mode and re-read the events that resulted from steps 1-3. (When not in recovery mode, the scenario above at least usually results in a non-fatal error; in recovery mode it's fatal because of changes in the timing of seeing the various events.)
